description: This file is a Markdown document that serves as a comprehensive integration guide and documentation for a Supabase-based cloud resource manager project. It details environment setup, frontend and backend components, database schema, deployment instructions, troubleshooting, and usage workflows.

methods.name: supabase()
methods.description: Returns a memoized Supabase client instance used for frontend interactions.

methods.name: createLinkedAccount()
methods.description: Calls the 'link-account' Edge Function to securely link a cloud account by submitting credentials.

methods.name: getLinkedAccounts()
methods.description: Fetches the list of cloud accounts linked by the current user, scoped via RLS policies.
